definitionGroups.group: Agent noun of skulk; one who skulks.

entries.meaning: One who stays where they cannot be seen (often in a cowardly way or with the intent of doing harm).
examples: Our men, from their position, can’t see these skulkers, who will have a good chance to pick off some of them at their leisure.

entries.meaning: One who moves in a stealthy or furtive way; one who comes or goes while trying to avoid detection.
examples: Afterwards he was again taken by Ethiopian Skulkers, and carry’d away into the Maritime Parts of Ethiopia.

entries.meaning: One who avoids an obligation or responsibility.
